org.apache.flink.core.io

接口 InputSplitSource<T extends InputSplit>

  • 类型参数:
    T - The type of the input splits created by the source.
    所有超级接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    所有已知子接口:
    InputFormat<OT,T>
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractTableInputFormat, AvroInputFormat, BinaryInputFormat, CassandraInputFormat, CollectionInputFormat, CsvInputFormat, DelimitedInputFormat, FileCopyTaskInputFormat, FileInputFormat, GenericCsvInputFormat, GenericInputFormat, HadoopInputFormat, HadoopInputFormat, HadoopInputFormatBase, HadoopInputFormatBase, HadoopInputFormatCommonBase, HBaseRowInputFormat, HCatInputFormat, HCatInputFormatBase, IteratorInputFormat, JDBCInputFormat, OrcRowInputFormat, ParallelIteratorInputFormat, PojoCsvInputFormat, PrimitiveInputFormat, ReplicatingInputFormat, RichInputFormat, RowCsvInputFormat, SerializedInputFormat, TableInputFormat, TextInputFormat, TextValueInputFormat, TupleCsvInputFormat, TypeSerializerInputFormat

    @Public
public interface InputSplitSource<T extends InputSplit>
extends java.io.Serializable
    InputSplitSources create InputSplits that define portions of data to be produced by InputFormats.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      T[] createInputSplits(int minNumSplits)
      Computes the input splits.
      InputSplitAssigner getInputSplitAssigner(T[] inputSplits)
      Returns the assigner for the input splits.

    • 方法详细资料

      • createInputSplits

        T[] createInputSplits(int minNumSplits)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Computes the input splits. The given minimum number of splits is a hint as to how many splits are desired.
        参数:
        minNumSplits - Number of minimal input splits, as a hint.
        返回:
        An array of input splits.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Exceptions when creating the input splits may be forwarded and will cause the execution to permanently fail.

      • getInputSplitAssigner

        InputSplitAssigner getInputSplitAssigner(T[] inputSplits)
        Returns the assigner for the input splits. Assigner determines which parallel instance of the input format gets which input split.
        返回:
        The input split assigner.
